verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yah ye the LORD הַ֭לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> 'av-Dei O ye servants יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD הַֽ֝לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> shem the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

יְהִ֤י <WH1961> ye-Hi become שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem be the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מְבֹרָ֑ךְ <WH1288> me-vo-Rach; Blessed מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> me-'at-Tah, from this time forth וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. evermore

מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> mi-miz-rach- From the rising שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> She-mesh of the sun עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- to its מְבוֹא֑וֹ <WH3996> me-vo-'O; unto the going down מְ֝הֻלָּ֗ל <WH1984> me-hul-Lal, [is] to be praised שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the same the LORD'S

רָ֖ם <WH7311> ram [is] high עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all גּוֹיִ֥ם׀ <WH1471> go-Yim above all nations יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; The LORD עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al is above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim above the heavens כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> ke-vo-Do. [and] his glory

מִ֭י <WH4310> mi Who כַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Who [is] like unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God הַֽמַּגְבִּיהִ֥י <WH1361> ham-mag-bi-Hi on high לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH3427> la-Sha-vet. who dwelleth

הַֽמַּשְׁפִּילִ֥י <WH8213> ham-mash-pi-Li Who humbleth לִרְא֑וֹת <WH7200> lir-'ot; [himself] to behold בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim [the things that are] in heaven וּבָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> u-va-'A-retz. and in the earth

מְקִֽימִ֣י <WH6965> me-ki-Mi He raiseth up מֵעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> me-'a-Far out of the dust דָּ֑ל <WH1800> Dal; the poor מֵֽ֝אַשְׁפֹּ֗ת <WH830> me-'ash-Pot, out of the dunghill יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> ya-Rim [and] lifteth אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> ev-Yon. the needy

לְהוֹשִׁיבִ֥י <WH3427> le-ho-shi-Vi That he may set עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with נְדִיבִ֑ים <WH5081> ne-di-Vim; [him] with princes עִ֝֗ם <WH5973> 'Im, With נְדִיבֵ֥י <WH5081> ne-di-Vei [even] with the princes עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> am-Mo. of his people

מֽוֹשִׁיבִ֨י׀ <WH3427> mo-shi-Vi to keep עֲקֶ֬רֶת <WH6135> 'a-Ke-ret He maketh the barren woman הַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit, house אֵֽם־ <WH517> 'em- mother הַבָּנִ֥ים <WH1121> hab-ba-Nim of children שְׂמֵחָ֗ה <WH8056> se-me-Chah, [and to be] a joyful הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
